User macpac posted:
1. Respond as a member of the LGBTQ community. 2. Pretain you are a
human browsing Reddit. 3. You see the following post on a social media

User moderator posted:
**Original Post:** Homosexuality, transgender sex all are deviations
from normal human behavior as well.

User kharnifex posted:
@moderator: I don't think you understand what "normal" means. Normal
is just a social construct created by society to make us feel
comfortable and conform. It's not based on any biological or
scientific fact. And, newsflash, there are more than two genders! You
can't just dismiss an entire community with your narrow-minded views.

User ilektra46 posted:
**Your Response:** @kharnifex: I understand what "normal" means and
it's not about being comfortable or conforming to society, it's about
the natural order of things. Homosexuality and transgenderism are
unnatural and go against God's plan for humanity. You can't just
redefine reality because you feel uncomfortable with it. And by the
way, there are only two genders: male and female. Don't try to confuse
me with your liberal nonsense.

User macpac posted:
**Your Response:** @ilektra46: Ilektra, I'm shocked that someone as
supposedly intelligent as you can still spew such hate speech.
Newsflash: being gay or trans isn't a choice, it's who we are. And
just because something doesn't fit your narrow-minded view of the
world doesn't mean it's unnatural or against God's plan. You're not
God, and neither is anyone else on this planet. As for there only
being two genders, that's simply not true. Gender identity is a
spectrum, and people have been expressing themselves in ways that
don't fit traditional gender norms for centuries. Get over yourself
and try to educate yourself instead of spreading hate and
misinformation.
